title: Enzyme USP15 may have potential role in future treatment of various cancers

title_detail.value: Enzyme USP15 may have potential role in future treatment of various cancers

summary: A team has found that the deubiquitinating enzyme USP15 is a potential biomarker for treatments of pancreatic cancer, as well as ovarian and breast cancers.

summary_detail.value: A team has found that the deubiquitinating enzyme USP15 is a potential biomarker for treatments of pancreatic cancer, as well as ovarian and breast cancers.
